AzureBlade's fast speed allowed him to dodge the missile easily. He 
took his rifle in his left hand and fired high velocity bullets at 
perceptor.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> 
> Perceptor ignored the Azure blade and Sideswipe's shots. And he 
fired 
> 2 missiles: One to Sideswipe and other to Azure Blade.
>

>
